document_data.name: Callidyrr mead
document_data.mainbody: '''Callidyrr mead''' was a [[wikipedia:mead|mead]] brewed on the island of [[Alaron]] in the [[Moonshae Isles]].
document_data.Geography: The mead was served in the tent of [[Geoffrey|Geoffrey the aleman]] during the Festival of the Spring Equinox in [[1345 DR]].
document_data.Description: It was known for being a very thick beverage.
